blogPost.excerpt: 📈HireBeat for Employers is an automated interview screening platform that saves employers time 🕗 and money💰! HireBeat delivers one-way interview invitations that allow the employer to review & evaluate candidate performance anytime, anywhere.
blogPost.body: 📈HireBeat for Employers is an automated interview screening platform that saves employers time 🕗 and money💰! HireBeat delivers one-way interview invitations that allow the employer to review & evaluate candidate performance anytime, anywhere.
blogPost.title: HireBeat - Automated interview platform that accelerates hiring process
blogPost.author: Ning Wei

localize.description: 📈HireBeat for Employers是一个自动面试筛选平台，为雇主节省时间🕗和金钱💰! HireBeat提供单向面试邀请，让雇主随时随地审查和评估候选人的表现。
localize.tagline: 自动面试平台，加速招聘流程。

localize.description: 📈HireBeat for Employers是一個自動面試篩選平臺，爲僱主節省時間🕗和金錢💰! HireBeat提供單向面試邀請，讓僱主隨時隨地審查和評估候選人的表現。
localize.tagline: 自動面試平臺，加速招聘流程。

previous.excerpt: Create and send professional invoices and estimates with an online solution Invoicy. A few clicks and you can accept payment online using Paypal or Stripe. Most suitable for freelancers and small teams, happy invoicing!
previous.title: Invoicy 2.0 - Invoicing solution for freelancers and small teams

localize.description: 使用在线解决方案Invoicy创建和发送专业发票和估算。只需点击几下，你就可以使用Paypal或Stripe在线接受付款。最适合自由职业者和小团队使用，祝您开票愉快!
localize.tagline: 为自由职业者和小型团队提供的发票解决方案。

localize.description: 使用在線解決方案Invoicy創建和發送專業發票和估算。只需點擊幾下，你就可以使用Paypal或Stripe在線接受付款。最適合自由職業者和小團隊使用，祝您開票愉快!
localize.tagline: 爲自由職業者和小型團隊提供的發票解決方案。

next.excerpt: As you browse the Web Dashboard add-on tracks the time spent on each website. This data is then displayed in a visually intuitive and interactive manner. Understand your browsing and fight distractions! Privacy focus: Your data never leaves your computer!
next.title: Web Dashboard - Track, visualize, and analyze your time spent online

localize.description: 当您浏览网页时，Web Dashboard插件会跟踪您在每个网站上花费的时间。这些数据会以直观和互动的方式显示。了解您的浏览情况，避免分心! 注重隐私：您的数据永远不会离开您的电脑!
localize.tagline: 追踪、可视化并分析您在网上花费的时间。

localize.description: 當您瀏覽網頁時，Web Dashboard插件會跟蹤您在每個網站上花費的時間。這些數據會以直觀和互動的方式顯示。瞭解您的瀏覽情況，避免分心! 注重隱私：您的數據永遠不會離開您的電腦!
localize.tagline: 追蹤、可視化並分析您在網上花費的時間。
